crimm.Modeller.TopoLoader

Functions

atom_add_neighbors(atom1, atom2)

Add atom2 to atom1's neighbors and vice versa

chain_trace_atom_neighbors(chain, ...[, ...])

Trace all bonds within the chain and add the atoms to each other's neighbors list.

clear_atom_neighbors(entity)

Clear all neighbors of atoms in an entity

excute_cgenff(cgenff_path, input_mol2_block)

Excute cgenff to generate topology and parameter files for a given molecule.

get_bonds_within_residue(residue)

Return a list of bonds within the residue (peptide bonds linking neighbor residues are excluded).

get_cmap(chain)

Return a list of CMap terms within the chain.

get_impropers(chain)

Return a list of improper angles within the chain.

residue_get_impropers(residue)

Return a list of improper angles within the residue.

residue_trace_atom_neigbors(residue)

Trace all bonds within the residue and add the atoms to each other's neighbors list.

traverse_graph(cur_atom, angle_set, ...)

Traverse the graph of atoms and add all angles and dihedral angles to the angle and dihedral sets.

Classes

CGENFFTopologyLoader([cgenff_path, save_path])

Class for loading topology definition to the heterogen residues where the topology and parameters are generated by cgenff.

CGENFFTopologySet()

Class for loading topology definition to the heterogen residues where the topology and parameters are generated by cgenff.

ChainTopology()

A class object that stores topology elements (bond, angles, dihe, etc) of bio-polymer chains, e.g. Protein, RNA, DNA.

HeterogenTopology()

A class object that stores topology elements (bond, angles, dihe, etc) for a heterogen residue, e.g. ligand, water, ions, etc.

ModelTopology(model)

A class object that stores topology elements (bond, angles, dihe, etc) for a model.

ParameterLoader([entity_type])

A class object that loads parameters from CHARMM prm files. ic_position_dict = { 'R(I-J)': (0, 1), 'T(I-J-K)': (0, 1, 2), 'T(J-K-L)': (1, 2, 3), 'R(K-L)': (2, 3), 'T(I-K-J)': (0, 2, 1), 'R(I-K)': (0, 2), } param_dict structure: { 'bonds': { (atom_type1, atom_type2): (k_bond, r0), ... }, 'angles': { (atom_type1, atom_type2, atom_type3): (k_angle, theta0), ... }, 'dihedrals': { (atom_type1, atom_type2, atom_type3, atom_type4): (k_dihedral, phi0), ... }, 'improper': { (atom_type1, atom_type2, atom_type3, atom_type4): (k_improper, theta0), ... }, 'cmap': { (atom_type1, atom_type2, atom_type3, atom_type4, atom_type5, atom_type6, atom_type7, atom_type8): cmap_table, ... }, 'nonbonded': { atom_type: (epsilon, rmin), ... }, 'nonbonded14': { atom_type: (epsilon, rmin), ... }, 'nbfix': { (atom_type1, atom_type2): (epsilon, rmin), ... } }.

ResiduePatcher()

Class Object for patching a residue with a patch definition

ResidueTopologySet([entity_type, rtf_parser])

Class for loading topology definition to the residue and find any missing atoms.

TopologyGenerator([cgenff_excutable_path, ...])

Class for generating topology elements from the topology definition and parameters.
